content.rendered:
Drug Rehab in Stevenage

If you’re searching for drug rehab in Stevenage, you’ve already taken a powerful step toward recovery. At Abbington House, located right here in Stevenage, Hertfordshire, we offer private, trauma-informed drug addiction treatment with fast admissions and personalised care to help you reclaim your future.
CALL 01438 583222
Home/No breadcrumbs

Private Drug Addiction Treatment in Stevenage

At Abbington House, we believe drug rehab should feel personal, safe, and achievable. We provide:
  • Medically supervised drug detox programmes
  • Bespoke residential drug rehab plans tailored to your needs
  • Specialist therapy for trauma, anxiety, depression and dual diagnosis
  • 24/7 support in a calm, private setting
  • Discreet, confidential admissions with no waiting lists
  • Holistic therapies and activities to support self-regulation.
Wherever you are in your journey, healing starts here with real support and zero judgment.
Call Our Admissions Team

Why Choose Abbington House for Drug Rehab in Stevenage?

Why Choose Abbington House for Drug Rehab in Stevenage?

  • Located in Stevenage - no long-distance travel needed
  • Private, personalised addiction care from experienced professionals/li>
  • Integrated mental health support and trauma therapy
  • Fast, responsive admissions for immediate help
  • Comprehensive aftercare planning
Choosing drug addiction rehab close to home reduces the stress of getting help and gives you the best chance to build lasting recovery with support systems nearby.

Personalised Drug Detox and Rehabilitation Plans

No two recovery journeys are the same. That’s why every programme at Abbington House is tailored around you.

  • Safe, structured drug detox protocols
  • One-to-one therapy sessions with addiction specialists/li>
  • Trauma therapy (CBT, EMDR, inner child work)
  • Group support sessions for shared strength and resilience
  • Holistic therapies (mindfulness, yoga and sound therapy) to heal the whole person
Your recovery story matters to us. So does your future. If you or a loved one need help with drug addiction in Stevenage, our team are here to support you in taking the first step.

Serving Stevenage and the Surrounding Areas

Abbington House is proud to serve individuals and families from across Hertfordshire:

  • Hitchin
  • Knebworth
  • Letchworth Garden City
  • Baldock
  • Welwyn Garden City
  • St Albans
  • Hatfield
  • Watford
  • Hemel Hempstead
If you're searching for "drug rehab near me" anywhere in Hertfordshire, you are not alone and help is closer than you think. Our location is also in close proximity to London and Bedfordshire.

Fast, Private Admissions with Full Support

Starting treatment is easier than you might imagine:
  • Confidential calls with experienced admissions advisors
  • Or speak to our friendly team on Livechat
  • Quick access to detox beds and treatment places
  • Warm, supportive welcome from the first conversation
Call For Admissions

FAQs

Where is Abbington House located?

Abbington House is based in Stevenage old town, Hertfordshire, offering fast access to private drug addiction treatment for residents across the region.

How quickly can I start drug detox in Stevenage?

We usually arrange fast admissions within 24–72 hours after your first confidential enquiry.

Is Abbington House a private drug rehab?

Yes. We are a fully private, trauma-informed residential rehab, offering discreet care for people who want personal, safe recovery pathways.

What drugs do you provide detox for?

We support detox and treatment for a wide range of substances, including cocaine, cannabis, heroin, prescription medications, benzodiazepines and others.

Do you offer mental health support alongside addiction treatment?

Absolutely. Many people facing drug addiction also experience anxiety, depression, or PTSD. Our team specialises in treating dual diagnosis with compassion and trauma-informed expertise.

Do you treat alcohol addiction?

Yes, we provide an alcohol rehab programme in Stevenage. Abbington House offers fully personalised treatment for both alcohol and drug addiction from our centre in Hertfordshire.

Take the Next Step

If you’re ready to explore private drug rehab in Stevenage, Abbington House is here for you. We offer fast, confidential admissions with a team who truly cares. Whether you’re calling for yourself or a loved one, we’ll meet you with warmth, respect, and expert guidance, no pressure, no judgement.

Call our admissions team today to begin the conversation. You don’t have to figure this out alone.
Call 01438 583222
